Lancaster.KAVL:
KAVL (610 AM, "Fox Sports 610") is a sports radio station broadcasting from Lancaster, California owned by RZ Radio LLC. It is the Los Angeles home of the Rich Eisen Show.
It has a directional-east 4900 watt signal during the day and a directional-south 4000 watt signal during the night.


== History ==

KAVL came on air on September 8, 1950 on 1340 kHz.
